location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 193: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell encloses two letters (not included): one from Mirza Ahmed Khan to Hennell, on the subject of Mirza Ahmed Khan's relations with the Shiraz Agent, Mirza Mahmood; and one from Mirza Abdool Bakee to Hennell, which concerns a gold watch (first referred to by Hennell in his earlier letter to Justin Sheil, no. 192, dated 16 May 1850), which Mirza Abdool Bakee bought from Mirza Mahmood.
